!Frontier Post Rowan: Aren't you a suspicious fellow! Why are you here? Where are you from? You have a peculiar accent. Could it be that you are a spy from Elmore? We have had a lot of trouble with foreigners lately, especially ones from Rune and Lansk. Recently some spies from Rune were posing as brigands in this area, causing a lot of havoc... You wouldn't be one of them, would you? Well, you don't look like them. You may go! [npc_%objectId%_TerritoryStatus|See the Lord and get the tax rate information.] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
